string.value: So, you follow #p1201000#'s instructions and look in the Mirror of Desire once more. Your vision gets dark for a second, but then you find yourself in #m211000000#, once again returning to the past. Standing before you is a Yeti in tears. What's going on? You'd better talk to #b#p1203001##k.

Sniffling heavily, #p1203001# says a thief stole his gem. He is distraught that his red gem is gone, after he had so painstakingly created it. A red gem? It must have something to do with the #t4032312#! You should find the thief on behalf of #p1203001#.

#o9001013##r #a213031##k
#i4032339# #t4032339# #b#c4032339# / 1#k

#p1203001# thanked you for retrieving his gem and taught you how to make a #t4032312# as a token of his appreciation. #t4032312# can be made using #b1 Dark Crystal, 3 Diamond Ores, and 3 Garnett Ores#k and combining them with the #bMaker Skill#k. Don't forget it when making the #t4032312# for #p1201002#.
Yes! Pretty red gem! You amazing! Happy #p1203001# teach you how to make pretty red gem, too.
Red Jade made with #bMaker Skill#k. Red Jade made with #b1 Dark Crystal#k, #b3 Diamond Ores#k, and #b3 Garnet Ores#k! You make Red Jade now?
Hehehe, #p1203001# now eat the gem. Om nom nom nom. Bye bye!
Still no catch thief? Thief went left. Find thief and give me gem.
Still no catch thief? Thief went left. Find thief and give me gem.
